name: Cosmic Bit Flip
description:
When things disappear in this world, they reappear in the other. (So if you lose a life in one world, you get one in the other world. Same thing for ammo.)

Controls:

- WASD To Move

- Left Mouse Button To Shoot

Featuring:

- Dope music and sound effects

- Visuals that make you tweak instantly

- Rabid dogs from hell

Made during the 2022 Global Game Jam by the 💃Quirky Dancers🕺:

Damian Been (Music, Sfx and Visuals) and Pelle Bruinsma (Boring Computer Beep Boop).

Special thanks to Batfeula, Mrmo, Leafthief.

(The web build may be a bit weird)
